definitions.definition: a small container that is like a bowl in shape, usually with a handle, used for drinking tea, coffee, etc.

examples.text: He filled the cup with water.
a **coffee cup**
a **cup and saucer**
a plastic/paper cup
Customers don't like drinking out of plastic cups.
He raised his cup to his lips.
She was so thirsty that she drained her cup.
She drank the whole cup.
Would you like a cup of tea?
Enrique stirred his fourth cup of coffee of the day.
I drink about ten cups of coffee a day.
I like a good strong cup of tea first thing in the morning.
I'm making tea. Can I pour you a cup?
My coffee was cold, so I ordered a fresh cup.
You sit down and I'll make you a nice cup of tea.

definitions.definition: a gold or silver cup on a stem, often with two handles, that is given as a prize in a competition

examples.text: She's **won** several **cups** for skating.
He **lifted the cup** *(= won)* for the fifth time this year.
The cup will be presented to the winning team by the president himself.
Who won the cup?

phrases: the first, etc. round of the cup

definitions.definition: a sports competition in which a cup is given as a prize

examples.text: the World Cup
The team finished runners-up in the league and cup.
They lost to Portugal in the World Cup quarter finals.
Will Liverpool secure a place in next year's UEFA Cup?
They were the surprise winners of last year's America's Cup.
Sunderland beat Port Vale at the beginning of their cup run (= a series of winning games in a competition to win a cup).
the Ryder Cup competition
They were the first Turkish team to win a major cup competition.
The team are ready for next week's World Cup clash with Italy.

phrases: the first, etc. round of the cup

definitions.definition: a unit for measuring quantity used in cooking mainly in the US; a metal or plastic container used to measure this quantity

examples.text: two cups of flour and half a cup of butter

definitions.definition: a thing that has the shape of a cup

examples.text: The device has a suction cup to attach it to the wall.

definitions.definition: one of the two parts of a bra that cover the breasts

examples.text: a C cup

definitions.definition: a drink made from wine mixed with, for example, fruit juice
the hole on the green, or the metal container inside it, that you must get the ball into
a piece of plastic that a man wears over his sex organs to protect them while he is playing a sport

examples.text: He gets very maudlin when he's in his cups.

definitions.definition: not what somebody likes or is interested in

examples.text: An evening at the opera isn't everyone's cup of tea.
He's nice enough but not really my cup of tea.

definitions.definition: nothing is completely certain until it really happens because things can easily go wrong

wordOrigin: Old English: from popular Latin cuppa, probably from Latin cupa ‘tub’.
